/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/reboot.dir/src/reboot.cpp.o  -o /home/derek/my-crazyflie/crazyflie_ws/devel/lib/crazyflie_tools/reboot -rdynamic /home/derek/my-crazyflie/crazyflie_ws/devel/lib/libcrazyflie_cpp.so -lboost_program_options -lusb-1.0 -Wl,-rpath,/home/derek/my-crazyflie/crazyflie_ws/devel/lib
